author: tomj
msg: Fix the broken fix I submitted which sets the hostname used for
WSDL locations.  Can't seem to get the ip address and/or hostname
that I need so put back the hardwired 'localhost'.  This is broken, but
for what we use SimpleAxisServer for, it is sufficient.

author: butek
msg: I'm still not sure getting the namespace for an operation from the portType
is the right thing to do, but it's better than what was there.  Where SHOULD

author: dims
msg: Improve performance of SimpleAxisServer for more stringent testing in a multi-threaded environment.
- Start a new thread in SimpleAxisServer for each client socket.
- Extract code from SimpleAxisServer into SimpleAxisWorker
The success ratio of MultithreadTestCase jumped from ~205/400 to ~320/400 on both JDK13 and JDK14
